name: AirHealth
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Air+Health's Alexa app for controlling all your air+health products including Skye.

There’s no need to go to your air+health product to adjust its setting - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo.
Connecting Alexa to your air+health products just takes a few simple steps:

1.Download “air+health” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “air+health” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "Air Health" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill, and you will be navigated to the login page
6.Follow the instruction, you'll be redirected to the successful connection page
7.Now you’re ready to control your air+health product with Alexa!

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:

“Alexa, turn on air purifier.”
“Alexa, turn off air purifier.”
